title: Pixel 3 XL USB C to HDMI
content:
I bought a j5 create USB C to HDMI adapter. And it worked! I used it for a weekend(FOOTBALL), cause I can't miss my games. That Monday I got an update. Thursday night (TNF) it doesn't work. Shrugged it off. Thought it was the TV. Today at home, "No Joy". 

Anybody experienced this? I've googled it and I see it says it was "unsupported", but I've seen it for my own eyes it did. And ultimately if it did, why did they take it away???? 

***Or if you have a go around, please, be so kind...
